<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c150c09ec4f97636c6339f5687fdaa9f665095d2|patch 8.2.2506: Vim9: :continue does not work correctly in a :try block>
patch 8.2.2506: Vim9: :continue does not work correctly in a :try block

Problem:    Vim9: :continue does not work correctly in a :try block
Solution:   Add the TRYCLEANUP instruction. (closes #7827)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2506: Vim9: :continue does not work correctly in a :try block · vim/vim@c150c09
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2506: Vim9: :continue does not work correctly in a :try block · vim/vim@c150c09
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: :continue does not work correctly in a :try block Solution: Add the TRYCLEANUP instruction. (closes #7827)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/31842cd0772b557eb9584a13740430db29de8a51|patch 8.2.2505: Vim9: crash after defining function with invalid retu…>
patch 8.2.2505: Vim9: crash after defining function with invalid return type

Problem:    Vim9: crash after defining function with invalid return type.
Solution:   Clear function growarrays.  Fix memory leak.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2505: Vim9: crash after defining function with invalid retu… · vim/vim@31842cd
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2505: Vim9: crash after defining function with invalid retu… · vim/vim@31842cd
attachments.text: …rn type Problem: Vim9: crash after defining function with invalid return type. Solution: Clear function growarrays. Fix memory leak.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/44ec21c467ddf481b422c787324ea08f375f6942|patch 8.2.2504: Vim9: crash when using an argument from a closure>
patch 8.2.2504: Vim9: crash when using an argument from a closure

Problem:    Vim9: crash when using an argument from a closure.
Solution:   Check if gen_load_outer is NULL. (closes #7821)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2504: Vim9: crash when using an argument from a closure · vim/vim@44ec21c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2504: Vim9: crash when using an argument from a closure · vim/vim@44ec21c
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash when using an argument from a closure. Solution: Check if gen_load_outer is NULL. (closes #7821)

patch 8.2.2503: Vim9: a caught error may leave something on the stack

Problem:    Vim9: a caught error may leave something on the stack.
Solution:   Drop items from the stack if needed. (closes #7826)

patch 8.2.2502: a few github actions are failing

Problem:    A few github actions are failing.
Solution:   Install setuptools-rust. (closes #7823)
